snippet: Alex Ovechkin’s stunning end-to-end goal in the third period helped Washington win its season opener and send the Devils to their second straight loss.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Washington Capitals defeat New Jersey Devils, 5-2, in their season-opener; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Alex Ovechkin’s stunning end-to-end goal in the third period helped Washington win its season opener and send the Devils to their second straight loss.

headline.print_headline: Artful Effort by Ovechkin Foils Devils; Isles Also Fall
headline.main: Artful Effort by Alex Ovechkin Lifts Capitals Past Devils
